to_plus_plus_lift:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem to_plus_plus_lift {P Q : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η : «expr ⟶ » P Q) (hQ : presheaf.is_sheaf J Q) :
    «expr ≫ » (J.to_plus P) (J.plus_lift η hQ) = η :=
  by
  dsimp [plus_lift]
  rw [← category.assoc]
  rw [iso.comp_inv_eq]
  dsimp only [iso_to_plus, as_iso]
  rw [to_plus_naturality]
#align to_plus_plus_lift to_plus_plus_lift
to_plus_naturality:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem to_plus_naturality {P Q : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η : «expr ⟶ » P Q) :
    «expr ≫ » η (J.to_plus Q) = «expr ≫ » (J.to_plus _) (J.plus_map η) :=
  by
  ext
  dsimp [to_plus, plus_map]
  delta cover.to_multiequalizer
  simp only [ι_colim_map, category.assoc]
  simp_rw [← category.assoc]
  congr 1
  ext
  dsimp
  simp
#align to_plus_naturality to_plus_naturality
plus_map_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/

@[simp]
theorem plus_map_zero [preadditive D] (P Q : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D) : J.plus_map (0 : «expr ⟶ » P Q) = 0 :=
  by
  ext
  erw [comp_zero, colimit.ι_map, J.diagram_nat_trans_zero, zero_comp]
#align plus_map_zero plus_map_zero
plus_map_to_plus:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- `(P ⟶ P⁺)⁺ = P⁺ ⟶ P⁺⁺` -/
@[simp]
theorem plus_map_to_plus : J.plus_map (J.to_plus P) = J.to_plus (J.plus_obj P) :=
  by
  ext (X S)
  dsimp [to_plus, plus_obj, plus_map]
  delta cover.to_multiequalizer
  simp only [ι_colim_map]
  let e : «expr ⟶ » S.unop («expr⊤») := hom_of_le (order_top.le_top _)
  simp_rw [← colimit.w _ e.op, ← category.assoc]
  congr 1
  ext I
  dsimp
  simp only [diagram_pullback_app, colimit.ι_pre, multiequalizer.lift_ι, ι_colim_map_assoc, category.assoc]
  dsimp only [functor.op]
  let ee : «expr ⟶ » ((J.pullback (I.map e).f).obj S.unop) («expr⊤») := hom_of_le (order_top.le_top _)
  simp_rw [← colimit.w _ ee.op, ← category.assoc]
  congr 1
  ext II
  dsimp
  simp only [limit.lift_π, multifork.of_ι_π_app, multiequalizer.lift_ι, category.assoc]
  dsimp [multifork.of_ι]
  convert
    multiequalizer.condition (S.unop.index P)
      ⟨_, _, _, II.f, («expr𝟙») _, I.f, «expr ≫ » II.f I.f, I.hf, sieve.downward_closed _ I.hf _, by simp⟩
  · cases I
    rfl
  · dsimp [cover.index]
    erw [P.map_id, category.comp_id]
    rfl
#align plus_map_to_plus plus_map_to_plus
plus_map_plus_lift:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem plus_map_plus_lift {P Q R : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η : «expr ⟶ » P Q) (γ : «expr ⟶ » Q R)
    (hR : presheaf.is_sheaf J R) : «expr ≫ » (J.plus_map η) (J.plus_lift γ hR) = J.plus_lift («expr ≫ » η γ) hR :=
  by
  apply J.plus_lift_unique
  rw [← category.assoc, ← J.to_plus_naturality, category.assoc, J.to_plus_plus_lift]
#align plus_map_plus_lift plus_map_plus_lift
plus_map_id:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
@[simp]
theorem plus_map_id (P : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D) : J.plus_map ((«expr𝟙») P) = («expr𝟙») _ :=
  by
  ext x : 2
  dsimp only [plus_map, plus_obj]
  rw [J.diagram_nat_trans_id, nat_trans.id_app]
  ext
  dsimp
  simp
#align plus_map_id plus_map_id
plus_map_comp:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem plus_map_comp {P Q R : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η : «expr ⟶ » P Q) (γ : «expr ⟶ » Q R) :
    J.plus_map («expr ≫ » η γ) = «expr ≫ » (J.plus_map η) (J.plus_map γ) :=
  by
  ext : 2
  dsimp only [plus_map]
  rw [J.diagram_nat_trans_comp]
  ext
  dsimp
  simp
#align plus_map_comp plus_map_comp
plus_lift_unique:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem plus_lift_unique {P Q : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η : «expr ⟶ » P Q) (hQ : presheaf.is_sheaf J Q)
    (γ : «expr ⟶ » (J.plus_obj P) Q) (hγ : «expr ≫ » (J.to_plus P) γ = η) : γ = J.plus_lift η hQ :=
  by
  dsimp only [plus_lift]
  rw [iso.eq_comp_inv, ← hγ, plus_map_comp]
  dsimp
  simp
#align plus_lift_unique plus_lift_unique
plus_hom_ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem plus_hom_ext {P Q : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η γ : «expr ⟶ » (J.plus_obj P) Q) (hQ : presheaf.is_sheaf J Q)
    (h : «expr ≫ » (J.to_plus P) η = «expr ≫ » (J.to_plus P) γ) : η = γ :=
  by
  have : γ = J.plus_lift («expr ≫ » (J.to_plus P) γ) hQ :=
    by
    apply plus_lift_unique
    rfl
  rw [this]
  apply plus_lift_unique
  exact h
#align plus_hom_ext plus_hom_ext
iso_to_plus_inv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
@[simp]
theorem iso_to_plus_inv (hP : presheaf.is_sheaf J P) : (J.iso_to_plus P hP).inv = J.plus_lift ((«expr𝟙») _) hP :=
  by
  apply J.plus_lift_unique
  rw [iso.comp_inv_eq, category.id_comp]
  rfl
#align iso_to_plus_inv iso_to_plus_inv
iso_to_plus_hom:
@[simp]
theorem iso_to_plus_hom (hP : presheaf.is_sheaf J P) : (J.iso_to_plus P hP).hom = J.to_plus P :=
  rfl
#align iso_to_plus_hom iso_to_plus_hom
is_iso_to_plus_of_is_sheaf:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem is_iso_to_plus_of_is_sheaf (hP : presheaf.is_sheaf J P) : IsIso (J.to_plus P) :=
  by
  rw [presheaf.is_sheaf_iff_multiequalizer] at hP
  rsuffices : ∀ X, is_iso ((J.to_plus P).app X)
  · apply nat_iso.is_iso_of_is_iso_app
  intro X
  dsimp
  rsuffices : is_iso (colimit.ι (J.diagram P X.unop) (op («expr⊤»)))
  · apply is_iso.comp_is_iso
  rsuffices : ∀ (S T : «expr ᵒᵖ» (J.cover X.unop)) (f : «expr ⟶ » S T), is_iso ((J.diagram P X.unop).map f)
  · apply is_iso_ι_of_is_initial (initial_op_of_terminal is_terminal_top)
  intro S T e
  have : «expr ≫ » (S.unop.to_multiequalizer P) ((J.diagram P X.unop).map e) = T.unop.to_multiequalizer P :=
    by
    ext
    dsimp
    simpa
  have : (J.diagram P X.unop).map e = «expr ≫ » (inv (S.unop.to_multiequalizer P)) (T.unop.to_multiequalizer P) := by
    simp [← this]
  rw [this]
  infer_instance
#align is_iso_to_plus_of_is_sheaf is_iso_to_plus_of_is_sheaf
diagram_nat_trans_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
@[simp]
theorem diagram_nat_trans_zero [preadditive D] (X : C) (P Q : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D) :
    J.diagram_nat_trans (0 : «expr ⟶ » P Q) X = 0 := by
  ext (j x)
  dsimp
  rw [zero_comp, multiequalizer.lift_ι, comp_zero]
#align diagram_nat_trans_zero diagram_nat_trans_zero
diagram_nat_trans_id:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/

@[simp]
theorem diagram_nat_trans_id (X : C) (P : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D) :
    J.diagram_nat_trans ((«expr𝟙») P) X = («expr𝟙») (J.diagram P X) :=
  by
  ext
  dsimp
  simp only [multiequalizer.lift_ι, category.id_comp]
  erw [category.comp_id]
#align diagram_nat_trans_id diagram_nat_trans_id
diagram_nat_trans_comp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem diagram_nat_trans_comp {P Q R : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) D} (η : «expr ⟶ » P Q) (γ : «expr ⟶ » Q R) (X : C) :
    J.diagram_nat_trans («expr ≫ » η γ) X = «expr ≫ » (J.diagram_nat_trans η X) (J.diagram_nat_trans γ X) :=
  by
  ext
  dsimp
  simp
#align diagram_nat_trans_comp diagram_nat_trans_comp
